prop.name: postOfficeBoxNumber
prop.desc: The post office box number for PO box addresses.

prop.name: streetAddress
prop.desc: The street address. For example, 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy.

prop.name: addressCountry
prop.desc: The country. For example, USA. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

prop.name: addressLocality
prop.desc: The locality. For example, Mountain View.

ContactPoint.name: serviceArea
ContactPoint.desc: The geographic area where the service is provided.

ContactPoint.name: areaServed
ContactPoint.desc: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.

ContactPoint.name: hoursAvailable
ContactPoint.desc: The hours during which this service or contact is available.

ContactPoint.name: contactOption
ContactPoint.desc: An option available on this contact point (e.g. a toll-free number or support for hearing-impaired callers).

ContactPoint.name: availableLanguage
ContactPoint.desc: A language someone may use with or at the item, service or place. Please use one of the language codes from the IETF BCP 47 standard. See also inLanguage

ContactPoint.name: contactType
ContactPoint.desc: A person or organization can have different contact points, for different purposes. For example, a sales contact point, a PR contact point and so on. This property is used to specify the kind of contact point.

ContactPoint.name: productSupported
ContactPoint.desc: The product or service this support contact point is related to (such as product support for a particular product line). This can be a specific product or product line (e.g. "iPhone") or a general category of products or services (e.g. "smartphones").
